flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I created this pumpkin using Alphabet Borders cut on my Cricut using the CTMH Art Philosophy Cricut Cartridge. I wanted to create something fun for my daughters teacher so I went for an ABC pumpkin. =)

I cut 3 Alphabet borders on the Cricut at "Fit to Page" using the CTMH Art Philosophy Cricut Cartridge. I cut a 1 1/2" circle and looped 1 border then adhered to the top of the circle and then did the other 2 to create the pumkpin shape. For the top I cut 3 leaves using the Art Philosophy Cartridge as well and stamped them with the leaf stamp that comes with the Art Philosophy Collection from Close To My Heart. I used glue dots to adhere them to the top of the pumkin. The final step was using a strip of Kraft paper and rolling it on a pen then securing the shape I wanted with a glue dot and attaching with CTMH Liquid Glass to the top. Tada!!!

guide.summary: Paper pumpkin made as a Teacher gift using Alphabet Borders from the CTMH Art Philosophy Cricut Cartridge.
guide.title: Pumpkin Teacher Gift
